item.title: Writing Ansible Action plugin
item.description: Ansible action plugin Some facts: Action plugins run on control host with ansible process and not on target hosts. Modules are executed on target hosts. Action plugins can call other plugins or modules. Sometimes there is an action plugins and a module with the same name in order to run part of it on executing host and part on target host. Hello world Let’s get to code. We can create a file sample_action.
